title: 1.6.4 cauldron开服问题
author: johnnyjeff
txt_content:
在http://files.minecraftforge.net/Cauldron/下载了1.6.4的1.965.21.185版sever后用@echo OFF
java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar cauldron-1.6.4-1.965.21.185-server.jar
PAUSE
代码编辑bat开启后显示

bat开启后的代码

大神求助啊

replies.author: 梦雨雨雨雨
replies.txt_content:
johnnyjeff 发表于 2014-8-26 22:17
装了还是不行，Net Framework 2.0也装了，还是开服的bat有问题？
仔细看了一遍,那个意思是你缺少library文件夹

replies.author: johnnyjeff
replies.txt_content:
开bat后显示如下。。。
We appear to be missing one or more essential library files.
You will need to add them to your server before FML and Forge will run successfu

请按任意键继续. . .

replies.txt_content: 我不知道,我只知道水水水水到六级发布服务器= =

replies.txt_content:

装了还是不行，Net Framework 2.0也装了，还是开服的bat有问题？

replies.author: johnnyjeff
replies.txt_content:
1305904807 发表于 2014-8-26 20:47
仔细看了一遍,那个意思是你缺少library文件夹
我百度一下开服教程才知道要先用installer下载libraries才可以开服，谢谢
